sys_script.name: Remove Cat Item

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_229ee869c31222107e68b41ed4013137
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_854636_b_board_brainboard_architecture_templates</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Remove Cat Item</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	gs.info("before delete test 1");
	gs.info("before delete current.name == " + current.name);


	var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
	gr.addEncodedQuery('sc_catalogs=cdb42f1b53b46210e80451a0a0490e0e^name=' + current.name);
	gr.query();
	while (gr.next()) {
		gs.info("before delete INNN");
		gr.deleteRecord();
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-22 12:30:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>229ee869c31222107e68b41ed4013137</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Remove Cat Item</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Brainboard" source="x_854636_b_board">7062797e832822103e53f065eeaad32b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Brainboard">7062797e832822103e53f065eeaad32b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_229ee869c31222107e68b41ed4013137</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-22 12:50:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=229ee869c31222107e68b41ed4013137"/></record_update>
